data.text: @CBCNB The horse is out of the “open at all costs” barn @SecCardona built … never a concern for health only optics. We’ll send him the bills for our kids’ insulin from the post-covid diabetes epidemic we’re about to witness.
@ericviau @CBCNB We are moving forward regardless of pandemic

@sharla_cfm @ericviau @CBCNB @Gov_NB You’re right stop playing pretend. It is the best vaccine made so far. Get it get over it and then you’re actually much more immune than any of those so-called vaccines

@ericviau @CBCNB You mean the rapid tests that were recalled due to in accuracy and safety concerns?. Also of those 12,000 cases how many are hospitalized? Dead? Covid is nothing for kids. Stop trying to destroy their life over this
@CBCNB Is this a parody account? I can tell anymore
@ericviau @CBCNB I don't disagree it's concerning but who would administer the rapid tests? I don't think it's the teachers jobs to be responsible for students coming to school sick.
@ForeignObjects3 @CBCNB Apparently natural immunity doesn’t last.  You can be re-infected in as little as 7 weeks.  You know like the flu or cold, like everyone keeps comparing it to.
